thread.title: Paul from Oklahoma
thread.title_full: Viking Bags reviewed by Paul from Oklahoma

author: Paul from Oklahoma
title: Paul from Oklahoma
text: having to make spacers for the install, I wanted large bags, so the problem has nothing to do with Viking bags. I love the way the hing opens out. I like the fact that they can be locked. The bags on the bike when purchased was the cheapo multi-hole universals, and when it rained everything in them would get soaked. these look like they will be water tight. Love them These new ones are the 22" x 12" x 9"
